description:
Skull arrives on a giant fighter aircraft to try to convince Hibari, but he fails and starts randomly shooting missiles in desperation. But Hibari attacks with his Box Weapon, Cloud Hedgehog, and makes a hole in Skull’s aircraft. Air starts leaking out of the aircraft, and it slowly begins to fall. It looks like it’s going to fall right onto Namimori Middle School! Even Hibari freezes up, but the man wielding Sun Flames makes a move! What will become of Hibari’s inheritance succession test?
Source: crunchyroll
